channel.title: Hi need help on compile again please help me
channel.description:
i have this
Please choose an option below to do that function. Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for any updates that I post.
c - Compile your server. r - To Run your server. e - To exit out of the program. color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
Option:
You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to od Taharok's tutorial on the moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions link to download the newest JDK Update. Press any key to continue . . .
and then this what do i need thanks =)

item.title: Hi need help on compile again please help me
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

hey right click the compiler and replace it with:
@echo off
@TITLE compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

hope it helped!

Read full topic
